# reversing a string

```
package practice;

public class ReverseString {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		String str= "Harshi";
		String rev = " ";
		
**////		 Logic 1 using for loop**

		for(int i=str.length()-1;i>=0;i--) {
			rev = rev +str.charAt(i);			
		}

		System.out.println("reversed string is :"+ rev);
	}

}
```

**output**:

reversed string is : ihsraH


## Logic 2 converting string to chararray

char a[] =str.toCharArray();
for(int i=str.length()-1;i>=0;i--) {
			rev = rev +a[i];
		}
    
## Logic 3 using string builder class
```
		StringBuilder sb= new StringBuilder(str);
		StringBuilder rev1 = sb.reverse()
```

## Logic 4 using Stringbuffer class

```
StringBuffer b =new StringBuffer(str);
		StringBuffer rev1 =b.reverse();

		System.out.println("reversed string is :"+ rev1);
```
